Reviews.Title: Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: RumPunch
Reviews.Content: Great phone with all the features one needs.  It's great that it is unlocked, which provides for even more flexibility and choices, especially when it comes to carriers and travel.

Reviews.Title: Excellent phone even after 3 years
Reviews.Author: L. Lange
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone 3 years ago and it still works great after considerable use at home and abroad.  I love that it has WiFi, which has allowed me to avoid paying for a data plan.  My only complaints are that the keys on the keypad are a bit small and that the built-in browser is so old that it doesn't work at some WiFi locations.

Reviews.Title: Great phone
Reviews.Author: Stanley Kosasih
Reviews.Content: This phone is a great phone.Unlike most phones, it is made in Finland (as written on the phone's box and on the battery compartment of the phone).In Australia, it is only 99 AUD locked to Virgin Mobile (at Dicksmith's Electronic).So it is really great for the price (of 99 Dollars and genuinely made in Finland, not made in China).

Reviews.Title: Made in China?
Reviews.Author: T. Manes "Man Mountain"
Reviews.Content: After only two weeks the phone will not turn on. The quality of this phone is not the same as the original E63. My wife still uses her's on a daily basis since 2009. We have never had any problems with the original. This build quality is not the same! China?
